custom-block.s: BGMボリュームを %n にする

block-definition.comment: LABEL will stamp text on the stage at the given font size. The direction of the text is the direction the sprite is facing, and color will match the pen color.
block-definition.translations: de:drucke _ in Größe _ ca:etiqueta _ de mida _ es:etiqueta _ de tamaño _ fr:étiquette _ d'une taille de _

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), rotation = radians(this.direction() - 90), trans = new Point( this.center().x - stage.left(), this.center().y - stage.top() ), isWarped = this.Warped, len, pos; if (isWarped) {endWarp(); } context.save(); context.font = size + 'px monospace'; context.textAlign = 'left'; context.textBaseline = 'alphabetic'; context.fillStyle = this.color.toString(); len = context.measureText(text).width; trans = trans.multiplyBy(1 / stage.scale); context.translate(trans.x, trans.y); context.rotate(rotation); context.fillText(text, 0, 0); context.translate(-trans.x, -trans.y); context.restore(); pos = new Point( len * Math.sin(radians(this.direction())), len * Math.cos(radians(this.direction()))); pos = pos.add(new Point(this.xPosition(), this.yPosition())); this.gotoXY(pos.x, pos.y, false); this.changed(); if (isWarped) {this.startWarp(); } stage.changed();

block-definition.translations: de:ist _ leer? ca:_ buida? es:_ vacía? fr:_ vide?
de:behalte Elemente, die _ aus _ ca:manté els elements on _ de _ es:mantener los elementos donde _ de _ fr:garder les items tels que _ de _
de:kombiniere mit _ die Elemente von _ ca:combina amb _ els elements de _ es:combinar con _ los elementos de _ fr:combine avec _ les items de _
de:wenn _ dann _ sonst _ ca:si _ llavors _ si no _ es:si _ entonces _ sino _ fr:si _ alors _ sinon _
de:für _ = _ bis _ _ ca:per _ = _ fins _ _ es:para _ = _ hasta _ _ fr:pour _ allant de _ à _ _
de:füge Wörter zusammen _ ca:uneix les paraules _ es:unir las palabras _ fr:fusionne les mots _

de:falls _ dann _ und pause $pause-1-255-220-0 ca:si _ fes _ i atura-ho tot $pause-1-255-220-0 es:si _ haz _ y páralo todo $pause-1-255-220-0 fr:si _ faire _ et mettre tout en pause $pause-1-255-220-0

input.options: Animal={ Bird.mp3 Cat.mp3 Cricket.mp3 Crickets.mp3 Dog1.mp3 Dog2.mp3 Duck.mp3 Goose.mp3 Horse.mp3 HorseGallop.mp3 Kitten.mp3 Meow.mp3 Owl.mp3 Rooster.mp3 SeaLion.mp3 WolfHowl.mp3 } Camera={ camera.mp3 } Effects={ BalloonScratch.mp3 BellToll.mp3 Bubbles.mp3 CarPassing.mp3 DoorClose.mp3 DoorCreak.mp3 MotorcyclePassing.mp3 Plunge.mp3 Pop.mp3 Rattle.mp3 Ripples.mp3 SewingMachine.mp3 Typing.mp3 WaterDrop.mp3 WaterRunning.mp3 } Electronic={ AlienCreak1.mp3 AlienCreak2.mp3 ComputerBeeps1.mp3 ComputerBeeps2.mp3 DirtyWhir.mp3 Fairydust.mp3 Laser1.mp3 Laser2.mp3 Peculiar.mp3 Screech.mp3 SpaceRipple.mp3 Spiral.mp3 Whoop.mp3 Zoop.mp3 } Human={ BabyCry.mp3 Cough-female.mp3 Cough-male.mp3 FingerSnap.mp3 Footsteps-1.mp3 Footsteps-2.mp3 Laugh-female.mp3 Laugh-male1.mp3 Laugh-male2.mp3 Laugh-male3.mp3 PartyNoise.mp3 Scream-female.mp3 Scream-male1.mp3 Scream-male2.mp3 Slurp.mp3 Sneeze-female.mp3 Sneeze-male.mp3 } Instruments={ AfroString.mp3 Chord.mp3 Dijjeridoo.mp3 GuitarStrum.mp3 SpookyString.mp3 StringAccent.mp3 StringPluck.mp3 Suspense.mp3 Tambura.mp3 Trumpet1.mp3 Trumpet2.mp3 } MusicLoops={ Cave.mp3 DripDrop.mp3 Drum.mp3 DrumMachine.mp3 DrumSet1.mp3 DrumSet2.mp3 Eggs.mp3 Garden.mp3 GuitarChords1.mp3 GuitarChords2.mp3 HipHop.mp3 HumanBeatbox1.mp3 HumanBeatbox2.mp3 Jungle.mp3 Medieval1.mp3 Medieval2.mp3 Techno.mp3 Techno2.mp3 Triumph.mp3 Xylo1.mp3 Xylo2.mp3 Xylo3.mp3 xylo4.mp3 } Percussion={ CymbalCrash.mp3 DrumBuzz.mp3 Gong.mp3 HandClap.mp3 RideCymbal.mp3 Shaker.mp3 } Vocals={ BeatBox1.mp3 BeatBox2.mp3 Come-and-play.mp3 Doy-doy-doy.mp3 Got-inspiration.mp3 Hey-yay-hey.mp3 Join-us.mp3 Oooo-badada.mp3 Sing-me-a-song.mp3 Singer1.mp3 Singer2.mp3 Ya.mp3 }

block-definition.s: BGMをリピート再生する %'する'
BGMボリュームを %'vol' にする
効果音 %'music' を再生する

block-definition.s: 効果音をリピート再生する %'する'
効果音ボリュームを %'vol' にする
$notes 音階 %'音符' ボリューム %'ボリューム'

input.options: ド(C4) レ(D4) ミ(E4) ファ(F4) ソ(G4) ラ(A4) シ(B4) ド(C5)

block-definition.translations: de:für jedes _ von _ _

block.l: var freqStr = frequency.toString(); var array = [0xF0, 0x08, pin]; for (i = 0; i < freqStr.length; i++){ array.push(freqStr.charCodeAt(i)); } array.push(0xF7); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer(array));
